mapper.insert: insert into "User" (user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_tel, user_email, user_postal, user_load_address, user_detail_address, user_coupon, created_at, user_role, user_enable) values (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userTel}, #{userEmail}, #{userPostal}, #{userLoadAddress}, #{userDetailAddress}, 0, sysdate, 'ROLE_USER', 1)
mapper.select: select user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_tel, user_email, user_postal, user_load_address, user_detail_address, user_coupon, created_at, user_role, user_enable from "User" where user_id = #{userId}
